alert.note: Alert for Clark; Ford; Gray; Hodgeman; Lane; Meade; Ness (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Fire Weather Watch issued March 03 at 1:18PM CST until March 05 at 6:00PM CST by NWS Dodge City
info.description: ...Risk of Wildfire Spread Expected Sunday Afternoon... ...FIRE WEATHER WATCH IN EFFECT SUNDAY AFTERNOON FOR WIND AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONES 044, 045, 064, 077, 078, 087, AND 088... The National Weather Service in Dodge City has issued a Fire Weather Watch for wind and low relative humidity, which is in effect Sunday afternoon. * AFFECTED AREA...In Kansas, Fire Weather Zone 044 Lane, Fire Weather Zone 045 Ness, Fire Weather Zone 064 Hodgeman, Fire Weather Zone 077 Gray, Fire Weather Zone 078 Ford, Fire Weather Zone 087 Meade and Fire Weather Zone 088 Clark. * WINDS...Southwest 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 40 mph. * RELATIVE HUMIDITY...As low as 10 percent. * IMPACTS...Any ignitions will have the potential to burn out of control rapidly. Given the background drought conditions and very dry and dormant fuels, any outdoor burning, or any activities involving sparks or flames, are strongly discouraged Sunday afternoon.
info.instruction: A Fire Weather Watch means that critical fire weather conditions are forecast to occur. Listen for later forecasts and possible Red Flag Warnings.

area.areaDesc: Clark; Ford; Gray; Hodgeman; Lane; Meade; Ness
